author: andreas
content:
Uhh ... there is a watermark, isn't it? In the lower corner there is a watermark saying "manessinger.com". Or did I miss it in one size??? 

Basically the whole purpose is to attract people to the blog. Giving something away is always a good idea. The problem is, that most of my images don't lend themselves to being cropped to a cinemascope format. These two did and more will follow.
